channel.title: Soo uhh this happened
channel.description:
Lol me tinkering with packet 241: [Spoiler=Large IMG] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/8z0cbd.png[/img] [/Spoiler]
So umm first let me explain why you shouldn't immediately delete this thread although it is kinda spammy...
This deals with packet 241 packet 241 is responsible for spawning map regions or something like that actually it seems more to me like it copies a part of a map and makes a larger map out of it which is weird because its like looking at 64x64 copy of a 8x8 tile chunk lol..
The hacking potential here is when these tiles spawn the overwrite tiles that already spawned including tile objects like normal objects and even walls theoretically you could copy a cell with banks and spawn that cell whenever you wanted (or the reward chest that lazy admin didn't bother cross checking whether the activity was really finished or it was being used at the right coords)
This also overwrites clipping removes walls if you set it to removes objects lol gf containment zones made of boxes...
But really I just wanted to show off the picture I thought it was funny..
That happened because I was attempting to make a flat grass plane and for it i wanted every tile being copied to be grass but apparently it also has to do with map spawning so... EVERYTHING IS MADE OF GRASS lol...
BTW if you want to follow the development of the server I'm working on send me a pm I promise to break lots of S@#$ in hilarious ways <3

item.title: Soo uhh this happened
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

@Sk8r yes I know that I meant the leap from chunk to region copy isn’t something I need to learn lol it’s easy from there it’s like OK you can count to 10 now say 11…

item.title: Soo uhh this happened
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Roar337:

@sk8r not really this happened in the process of trying to spawn a flat plane like the one underneath the houses in construction early attempts copied a chunk cell from lumbridge if i have chink copy replacing a region is assumed knowledge and very simple from there.

That gif I just showed you is using the same packet as what you use to build the construction map…
So, yes really. (Don’t believe me: see the progression here)

item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

sini:

ollddd

Well YEA its a freaking packet to spawn maps lol! it’s about as old as runescape has had players but the function of this packet is still quite difficult to understand.
And all of that is besides the point anyways I just thought the unintended effect was sort of funny…

item.description:

Lol me tinkering with packet 241:
[Spoiler=Large IMG]

8z0cbd.png1600×900

[/Spoiler]

So umm first let me explain why you shouldn’t immediately delete this thread although it is kinda spammy…

This deals with packet 241 packet 241 is responsible for spawning map regions or something like that actually it seems more to me like it copies a part of a map and makes a larger map out of it which is weird because its like looking at 64x64 copy of a 8x8 tile chunk lol…

The hacking potential here is when these tiles spawn the overwrite tiles that already spawned including tile objects like normal objects and even walls theoretically you could copy a cell with banks and spawn that cell whenever you wanted (or the reward chest that lazy admin didn’t bother cross checking whether the activity was really finished or it was being used at the right coords)

This also overwrites clipping removes walls if you set it to removes objects lol gf containment zones made of boxes…

But really I just wanted to show off the picture I thought it was funny…

That happened because I was attempting to make a flat grass plane and for it i wanted every tile being copied to be grass but apparently it also has to do with map spawning so… EVERYTHING IS MADE OF GRASS lol…
